item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Lars,<br /><br />Drop Tim a line (his blog's at { <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://blog.tc-soft.com""/ rel="nofollow ugc">http://blog.tc-soft.com"</a> rel="nofollow" target ="blank">Link</a> } ) , I believe there are plans to bring the sessions to Europe next year, but I'm sure he can get you a copy of the materials if not.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Lars,

Drop Tim a line (his blog’s at { http://blog.tc-soft.com/“ rel=”nofollow” target =”blank”>Link } ) , I believe there are plans to bring the sessions to Europe next year, but I’m sure he can get you a copy of the materials if not.

Matt

item.title: By: Lars Berntrop-Bos
item.dc:creator: Lars Berntrop-Bos
item.description: <p>I'd love to attend and love to learn more about Xpages, but the fact I don't live near Hursley (in Holland) is limiting the options. <br /><br />Will the scripts/ examples/presentations becom available?<br /><br />Thanx,<br /><br />Lars</p>
item.content:encoded:
I’d love to attend and love to learn more about Xpages, but the fact I don’t live near Hursley (in Holland) is limiting the options.

Will the scripts/ examples/presentations becom available?

Thanx,

Lars
